action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
6/26/2014--Introduced. Recognizes the 45th anniversary of the protests following the police raid on the Stonewall Inn in New York, New York.
Honors those who participated during Stonewall and since that time in the civil rights struggle of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender Americans.
Recommits the House of Representatives to protecting and providing equal rights for all Americans, including those who are lesbian, gay, bisexual, or transgender.
